text: @realDonaldTrump You make no sense, are a bigot, racist & an ignorant twat. More important:  soldiers with bounties on their heads paid by Putin & condoned by you? Coronavirus spreading rapidly in GOP states & more deaths due to your ineptitude & that of GOP & a blatant disregard for life.
